T02D3164:182b-1: tree lo kya ba shyam kar lo ke shva ra s'a dha nam /
T02D3164:182b-3: 'jig rten gsum dbang du byed pa'i 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sgrub thabs /
T02D3164:182b-4: dang por re zhig yid dang rjes su mthun pa'i gnas su thang ka dgram par bya'o //
T02D3164:182b-5: de'i mdun du sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gur gum gyis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bya ste /
T02D3164:182b-7: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis so //
T02D3164:182b-8: de'i rjes la dza: h'um bam padma la bzhugs su
T02D3164:182b-9: gsol ho: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis spyan drangs la
T02D3164:182b-10: mandala gyi dbus su 'jig rten gsum dbang du mdzad
T02D3164:182b-11: pa'i rje btsun 'jig rten dbang phyug mchod pa bya
T02D3164:182b-12: ba'o // sngags 'di dag gis bya ba yin te /
T02D3164:182b-13: aom 'jig rten gsum dbang du mdzad pa'i rdo rje me tog h'um ba zhes su gsol sv'a h'a /
T02D3164:182b-14: de nas aom rdo rje thub pa mu: zhes bya bas gshegs su gsol la /
T02D3164:182b-15: rang gi snying gar yi ge aom dmar po rnam
T02D3164:182b-16: par bsams la de yongs su gyur pa las nyi
T02D3164:182b-17: ma'o // de'i steng du yi ge hr'i: dmar po'o //
T02D3164:182b-18: de'i 'od zer gyis de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba
T02D3164:182b-19: mtha' yas legs par spyan drangs la yang dag par
T02D3164:182b-20: mchod de / sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa
T02D3164:182b-21: byas shing 'jig rten gsum dbang du bya ba'i thabs
T02D3164:182b-22: rnams kyang 'od kyis rang gi sa bon la legs
T02D3164:182b-24: de dag yongs su gyur pa las skad cig gis
T02D3164:182b-25: sku thams cad dmar po chen pos dmar bar gyur
T02D3164:182b-26: ba'i 'jig rten dbang phyug zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis
T02D3164:182b-27: pa spyan gsum pa ral ba dang dbu rgyan dang
T02D3164:183a-0: ldan pa / rdo rjes mtshon pa'i @183a * //
T02D3164:183a-1: zhags pa dang lcags kyu phyag na bsnams pas gsum
T02D3164:183a-2: po lug gnyis kyi zhags pas bcing ba'i steng na
T02D3164:183a-3: / padma dmar po la rdo rje skyil mo krung
T02D3164:183a-4: gis bzhugs shing lha rdzas kyi rgyan dang na bzas
T02D3164:183a-5: rnam par brgyan par bdag nyid bsams la /
T02D3164:183a-6: rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
T02D3164:183a-7: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dang lha rnams kyis kyang dbang skur bar byed par rnam par bsams te /
T02D3164:183a-8: mgo bo la snang ba mtha' yas bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3164:183a-9: de nas snying ga'i nyi ma la hr'i: h'um yam
T02D3164:183a-10: zhes bya ba bzlas pas sngags yi ge gsum po
T02D3164:183a-11: 'di bsgoms la / aom stong pa nyid kyi ye
T02D3164:183a-12: shes rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid ni nga
T02D3164:183a-13: 'di bsgoms la / yin no // chos thams cad
T02D3164:183a-14: rdo rje'i bdag nyid kyi rdo rje'i bdag nyid ni
T02D3164:183a-15: nga yin no zhes bya ba rdo rje'i bdag nyid
T02D3164:183a-16: kyi sngags gnyis brjod par bya ba'o //
T02D3164:183a-17: de ltar goms par byas pa la g-yo ba 'phar
T02D3164:183a-18: ba la sogs pa'i yon tan 'byung bar 'gyur ro
T02D3164:183a-20: aom hr'i: a'a: h'um 'phrog ma gnod sbyin gyi dbang phyug ma sv'a h'a /
T02D3164:183a-21: zhes bya ba 'dis chang bu sbyin no //
T02D3164:183a-22: aom aam kom hr'im dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i dbang
T02D3164:183a-23: phyug ma'i tshogs 'khor dang bcas pa ma lus pa
T02D3164:183a-24: rnams aa aa aa ba ta ra aa ba ta
T02D3164:183a-25: ra phyogs bcu nas gshegs su gsol ba yang /
T02D3164:183a-26: 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyis kyang gtor ma 'di grihna grihna h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3164:183a-27: zhes bya bas gtor ma btang la /
T02D3164:183a-28: lha'i rnal 'byor gyis rnam par rgyu bar bya ba yin no /
T02D3164:183a-29: aom dyan nas 'byung ba'i rim pa 'jig rten gsum
T02D3164:183a-30: dbang du byed pa'i 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sgrub
T02D3164:183a-31: thabs / sa ra ha'i zhal nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
